```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library("tidyverse")
library("janitor")
```


```{r}
bigfoot <- read.csv("bigfoot copy/bfro_reports_geocoded.csv")
```

```{r}
bigfoot %>%
  count(state) %>%
  arrange(-n)
```

```{r}
bigfoot %>%
  filter(state=="California") %>%
  count(county) %>%
  arrange(-n)
```

```{r}
cali <- bigfoot %>%
  filter(state=="California")
```
